comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: I find no Harry Cooper listed as a St. Louis Terriers player, but there is a Henry Keupper who pitched for them in 1914, and baseball-reference.com uses this picture with his entry: www.baseball-reference.com/players/k/keupphe01.shtml LOC, any info on how theSABR committee did its identification?

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: artolog: It is indeed Henry Keupper.  We checked with our colleagues at SABR and they acknowledge their error.  We'll add this to our correction and update queue.
